creator: Indiejoy
descriptionHtml:
** Please Update the game (ver 1.1.5 More than)!

■ GAME OPEN COUPON
Coupon - MERGEMERGECAT
Reward - 150,000 Coin, Cat Stick 300, Tuna Can 300, Cat Ticket 3, Accessory Ticket 1

■ game introduction
In Merge Merge Cat, you can merge cute kitties together, put hats on them, feed them and enter adorable cat pageants! Play with your adorable kitties and before you know it, all your daily stress will be vanish!

■ Game characteristics
- Merge cats and you'll gain a brand new cat!
- Bathe and dress up your cats however you like
- Enter cat pageants to show off your cats to the world!
- Feel warm inside from just looking at the cats. Gotta collect them all!

■ How to play
- Merge cats of the same grade!
'- Earn coins and stick treats to upgrade various functions.
'- Collect many accessories to dress up your rare cats!
'- Buy various items to take care of your rare cats!
'- Increase your intimacy with your rare cats, then enter the cat pageant!
descriptionShort: Decorate your cats, take care of them, and enter cat pageants together!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
v. 2.0.6

1. Compensation for attendance of new users for 7 days

- Payment of attendance compensation for existing and new users

2. Reform of the cat care system

- Strengthened direct of cat condition expression

- Added new care features

- Reorganization of detailed information

3. Adding semi-automatic merge function products

4. Systems & Bugs

- System stabilization

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
v2.1.0

1. Reorganizing the Cat Care System

- Consolidate the trophies of each subject into one trophy.

- Adding a compensation system based on the number of trophies

- Adjust the interface for the convenience of fostering individual cats.


2. Reorganization of Tutorials

- Skip function added for each tutorial


3. Reorganizing the selection of goods


- 1 Rare Cat Picking and 10 + 1 More

- Consolidate pull pages into one page


4.Other improvement / system reinforcement

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
v2.1.2

1. Add LR Cat Token Synthesis System

- Added 1 to 6 stars to LR cat

- How LR cat tokens are synthesized with 1 additional star.


2. Auto-Murge 30-Day Product Adjustment

- Price adjustment: Existing: 110,000 -> 33,000

- Automatic 30 days / Jewel 2000 / Stick 2000 / Cat Ticket 3 / Accessory Ticket 6


3. Attendance Compensation Adjustment

- 7 Days Attendance Jewelry: 50-> 100

- 7 Days New Attendance Reward: 1 SR Cat / 500 Jewels

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
The game server has been changed.
Please save the game data again!!!!

- Add the Contest Total Trophy Reward

- Change to a rare cat tuna can offline acquisition.

- Improved guiding cat buff effect

- Changing the part-time job system

- Ranking improvement.

- Improving the playroom system

- Changing cash shop system and product prices and items

- Add cat name change feature

- Add roulette content

- Increase offline compensation by 10x

title: MergeMergeCat

creator: CHAPLIN GAME CO. LTD
descriptionHtml:
Be the greatest online butler!
Merge two cats and get a new cat!
Take care of your cats, decorate them, and participate in cat contests!

■ SPECIAL GAME CODE
Code - MERGEMERGECAT
Reward - 150,000 Coin, Cat Stick 300, Tuna Can 300, Cat Ticket 3, Accessory Ticket 1

■ Game Introduction
Merge Merge Cat is a game where you can merge cute kitties together, decorate them with accessories, feed them and show off by participating in cat contests.

■ Game characteristics
- Merge two cats and a brand new cat will appear!
- Dress up and take care of your cats however you like!
- Participate in cat contests and show off your cats to the world!
- Fun to collect cute cats that can make you feel warm by just looking at them. Gotta collect them all!

■ How to play
- Merge cats of the same grade!
- Earn coins and tickets to upgrade various functions.
- Collect many accessories to dress up your rare cats!
- Buy various items to take care of your rare cats!
- Increase your intimacy with your rare cats, then show off their attraction at the cat contest!
descriptionShort: Decorate your cats, take care of them, and enter cat pageants together!
